title: Just Do It
description: Inspired by DIA Studio's motion graphics, this is an experiment in changing text visibility using GLSL-like functions. Functions take in letter's x and y coordinates to determine visibility.

title: Overload
description: 3D planes changing distance from origin with sin wave

title: Please Stay Inside
description: Text position increased based on distance from center with an offset to create circular 3D effect.

title: Next World OVer
description: 2D text layers with offset based on mouse position.
